content:
IDesignTimeResourceWriter Interface

Definition

Used by the DesignTimeResourceProviderFactory class to localize data at design time.

In this Article

public interface IDesignTimeResourceWriter : System.Resources.IResourceWriter

Methods

CreateResourceKey(String, Object)

Creates a key, using the provided string, to use to retrieve data from the given resource.

public string CreateResourceKey (string resourceName, object obj);
Parameters
resourceName
String

The name of the resource.

obj
Object

The object to localize.

Returns
String

The key used to write or retrieve obj from resourceName.
